com.facebook.react.bridge

接口 ReactModuleWithSpec

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ImageLoaderModule, NativeAccessibilityInfoSpec, NativeAccessibilityManagerSpec, NativeActionSheetManagerSpec, NativeAlertManagerSpec, NativeAnimatedModuleSpec, NativeAnimationsDebugModuleSpec, NativeAppearanceSpec, NativeAppStateSpec, NativeAsyncStorageSpec, NativeBlobModuleSpec, NativeBugReportingSpec, NativeCameraRollManagerSpec, NativeClipboardSpec, NativeDatePickerAndroidSpec, NativeDeviceEventManagerSpec, NativeDeviceInfoSpec, NativeDevLoadingViewSpec, NativeDevMenuSpec, NativeDevSettingsSpec, NativeDialogManagerAndroidSpec, NativeExceptionsManagerSpec, NativeFileReaderModuleSpec, NativeFrameRateLoggerSpec, NativeHeadlessJsTaskSupportSpec, NativeHeapCaptureSpec, NativeI18nManagerSpec, NativeImageEditorSpec, NativeImageLoaderAndroidSpec, NativeImageLoaderIOSSpec, NativeImageLoaderSpec, NativeImagePickerIOSSpec, NativeImageStoreSpec, NativeJSCSamplingProfilerSpec, NativeJSDevSupportSpec, NativeKeyboardObserverSpec, NativeLinkingSpec, NativeLogBoxSpec, NativeModalManagerSpec, NativeNetworkingAndroidSpec, NativeNetworkingIOSSpec, NativePermissionsAndroidSpec, NativePlatformConstantsAndroidSpec, NativePlatformConstantsIOSSpec, NativePushNotificationManagerIOSSpec, NativeRedBoxSpec, NativeSegmentFetcherSpec, NativeSettingsManagerSpec, NativeShareModuleSpec, NativeSoundManagerSpec, NativeSourceCodeSpec, NativeStatusBarManagerAndroidSpec, NativeStatusBarManagerIOSSpec, NativeStatusBarManagerSpec, NativeTimePickerAndroidSpec, NativeTimingSpec, NativeToastAndroidSpec, NativeTVNavigationEventEmitterSpec, NativeUIManagerSpec, NativeVibrationSpec, NativeWebSocketModuleSpec, NetworkingModule, SourceCodeModule, WebSocketModule

    public interface ReactModuleWithSpec
    An interface to be implemented by react modules that extends from the generated spec class. This is experimental.
